game.name: Miss Neko: Pirates
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 해적들이 나타났다! 스컬 아일랜드의 해적 소녀들은 아직 군장의 진정한 능력을 목격하지 못했습니다, 선장님. 여러분은 여러분의 ❤기술❤로 하나씩 정복하고 소중한 보물을 여러분의 선박에 약탈할 수 있을까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pirates ahead! The pirate girls on Skull Island have yet to witness the true extent of your prowess, Captain. Can you conquer them one by one with your ❤SKILLS❤ and plunder that precious treasure onto your ship?

reviewHighlights.text: suuuuch a cute and fun game! love that you actually have to put a bit of effort in as opposed to just being handed the nsfw content. no real complaint...
its like offering a sandwhich but you just get served bread with spit on it there are parts of a good game here, but excicution is meh, i only played...
